s_synopsis: Some years have passed since the brave hero Jazeta destroyed Dirth, the Emperor of Darkness. Peace has returned to the land of Neutopia. But there are still monsters roaming the countryside, and some of them were spotted near Yurius Shrine. Jazeta went there to find out what exactly had happened. But he never returned. His son must first of all find his missing father. Can it be that the shadow of Emperor of Darkness threatens the peaceful land again?
